abstract: Peter Robinson, Northern Ireland’s first minister and Democratic Unionist Party leader, announces his resignation now that coalition with Irish Catholic leaders has been repaired.
lead_paragraph: Peter Robinson, 66, the first minister of Northern Ireland’s power-sharing government, said that he would retire from politics.

headline.main: Northern Ireland: Top Political Figure Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Europe; Northern Ireland: Top Political Figure Will Retire

snippet: Peter Robinson, 66, the first minister of Northern Ireland’s power-sharing government, said that he would retire from politics.
